message.content:
1. The optimal treatment for hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 6 is unclear.
2. Hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 6 has a limited geographic distribution.

messages.content:
Statement: The optimal treatment of hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 6 is unclear owing to its limited geographic distribution.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
